title.narrative: Guinea: Targeted country assistance
Guinée (la): Aide ciblée aux pays

description.narrative:
L’assistance technique est un soutien non financier fourni par des spécialistes. Elle peut revêtir plusieurs formes : partage d’information et de savoir-faire, formation et services-conseils.
L’assistance technique fournie dans le cadre du PEF est appelée aide ciblée aux pays. Ce type de soutien vise principalement à payer le personnel basé en permanence dans les bureaux pays des partenaires. Il repose sur la demande et les besoins identifiés par les pays eux-mêmes.

Technical assistance is non-financial support provided by specialists. It can take the form of sharing information and expertise, training and consulting services.
The technical assistance provided through PEF is called targeted country assistance (TCA). This type of support mainly consists of staff permanently based in partners’ country offices. It is based on the demand and needs identified by the countries themselves.

Cette activité détaille notre travail sur le Aide ciblée aux pays en Guinée (la), grâce à la mise à disposition des données budgétaires et des transactions. Nous fournissons également les documents pertinents qui guident ces activités que sont les formulaires de demande de soutien fournis par le gouvernement de Guinée (la) ainsi que les lettres de décisions émises par Gavi, pour progresser. Ces documents décrivent les activités, les objectifs ainsi que les bénéficiaires.

This activity details our work on Targeted country assistance in Guinea through the provision of budget and transaction data. We also provide the relevant documents that guide these activities, which are the support request proposal(s) provided by the Government of Guinea, as well as the decision letter(s) issued by Gavi, for progress. These documents describe the activities, the objectives as well as the beneficiaries.

title.narrative: CDC Foundation : Health Information Systems (Data)

Complete training of the national and >1 regional labs on detection of bacterial meningitis using the latest effective technology; Implement in-country programs to ensure lab proficiency; Complete analysis >90% of specimens collected between Jan-Aug 2020

target.value: CDC/DBD proposes the following activities to strengthen meningitis surveillance and early/rapid detection of disease epidemics to guide outbreak responses and country prepareness: 1) provide technical support and trainings to strengthen the detection of bacterial meningitis pathogens at the national lab and labs in regions at high risk for meningitis; 2) reinforce quality control programs and supervision visits to ensure laboratory proficiency 3) Improve lab data management, analysis, and reporting practices.

title.narrative: Complete trainings on data management and analysis processes; Complete supervision visits to at least 3 sites; Complete analysis >90% of specimens collected in 2020

target.value: CDC/DBD proposes the following activities to strengthen meningitis surveillance and early/rapid detection of disease epidemics to guide outbreak responses and country prepareness: 1) provide technical support and trainings to strengthen the detection of bacterial meningitis pathogens at the national lab and labs in regions at high risk for meningitis; 2) reinforce quality control programs and supervision visits to ensure laboratory proficiency 3) Improve lab data management, analysis, and reporting practices.

CDC/DBD proposes the following activities to strengthen meningitis surveillance and early/rapid detection of disease epidemics to guide outbreak responses and country prepareness: 1) provide technical support and trainings to strengthen the detection of bacterial meningitis pathogens at the national lab and labs in regions at high risk for meningitis; 2) reinforce quality control programs and supervision visits to ensure laboratory proficiency 3) Improve lab data management, analysis, and reporting practices.

title.narrative: WHO : Health Information Systems (Data)

Au moins 50% des activités du Plan d'amélioration de la qualité des données sont réalisées. Le groupe technique SNIS est fonctionnel. Le pool de 8 Experts nationaux deployés dans les DRS sont supervisés par l'IP3 (Data quality improvement/TCA/2019) sur les directives de la qualité des données y compris l'opérationalisation du DHIS2 dans les regions sanitaires

title.narrative: There are significant improvements in team management and in staff performance thanks to clearly defined incentives for high performance (training, increased responsability, visibility within the MoH, bonuses, etc.) A culture of peer to peer learning has been created in the EPI with sessions occuring at regular intervals and set up autonomously by the staff between them.
